title: Ice Cube and F. Gary Gray Interview
itunes:title: Ice Cube and F. Gary Gray Interview
description:
Ice Cube and Director F. Gary Gray discuss what it took to make 'Straight Outta Compton' and how authentic the movie is to what happened in the lives of N.W.A.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
